phrases: The phone case she picked out for me!
I am next-door neighbors with an actress!
I must be the only guy in history to get a gift from a rental girlfriend!
She must see me as someone special.
It is a small one, but I built another connection with her!
I am still using the aroma candle she gave me.
Is not she just the best?
Guess there are more of us than I thought...
It might give your clients the wrong idea.
It is perfectly normal for a girlfriend to give you gifts!
Uh, that much is true, but...
I know I am totally nothhhh justified here...
I would like to clear something up here and now.
Have you fallen in love with me?
We are only playing pretend couple for our grandmas, right?
Ruka-chan seems to think there is more to it,
but I am nothing more than a rental girlfriend.
If you were actually into me, that would change things entirely.
What have you two been getting up to?!
You told me you had other plans today!
It was a date with her?!
Why her, when you have me?!
YOU-Uh, I was just getting some life advice from her.
I cannot believe I just said that.
Well, you are going on a date with me now!
Let us keep things clean, and this relationship purely business.
I am just a partner in crime to Mizuhara.
What was I getting carried away for?
I need to take you somewhere.
I guess I should do what she wants.
I did do her wrong today, after all.
You can take off the blindfold now.
When hwill hhyou hhhget hhhhhere hhhhh?
When hwill hhyou hhhget hhhhhere hhhhh?
If you do not hurry up
I will charge you for an extension
Who does that girl think she is?
And that stupid virgin's pissing hme off, too!
Not like they will last more than three months, anyway

Receipt Kinoshita Kazuya-sama Rent-A-Girlfriend Itemized Bill Base Fee/hrhhhhhh 5000 yen x1 hChoice Fee (Rookie)hhhhhhhhh5000 yen x1 hhCosts (City Limits)hhhhhhhhhhhh2000 yen x1 Total: 12,000 yen + taxes
In the event that the cover is removed outside of an emergency, the offender will be fined 3,000 yen.
There is impulsive, and then there is this!
You two have gone way past rental girlfriend and client!
Wait, why did you take off your socks, then?
I remember you talking about grandmas and whatnot, but that is all.
Well, I guess she does know everything else.
I think I get the gist of it now.
We have been living on the edge, as much as I hate to admit it.
There is no way you can keep that lie up forever!
Will you keep it up even when you are old and gray?
The fee's going up by a thousand starting this month.
She is a rental girlfriend, you know!
You two do not have a future together!
B-But Gran totally believes that we are dating!
There is a simple solution to that.
You can just introduce me to her!
You do not need to turn to Chizuru-san anymore.
I will really lose her trust if I hop from one girl to another!
Besides, she is taken an abnormal liking to Mizuhara.
It will not be easy to just replace her.
Can you have sex with Chizuru-san?
That is what it is all about, is not it?
She is just a rental girlfriend.
No matter how long you keep it up, you and she can only have a platonic relationship!
Is that what your grandma wants?
I will have you know I am ready to take it all in.
I am actually thinking of the long term here!
I would not have brought you here otherwise!
So she was after this all along.
Do you not like me trying to get closer to you this way?
What am I going to do?!
I do not know if I can control myself!
All I can do is maintain an iron will!
Ruka-chan, why do not we calm down and order some room service...
I have got to take it one step at a time, right?
Sorry I had to drag you out first thing in the new year.
We are doing lunch and a shrine visit, so it will take half the day.
Well, not like we have a choice.
I am supposed to be your girlfriend.
It would be too weird if I did not see your family for New Year's.
Oh, but you will still have to pay, okay?
Wearing a kimono is a bit over the top.
We must not slight the soon-to-be Kinoshita in any way!
Here is to another great year together.
You are just as pretty in the new year!
It is way too nice for me.
Yeah, there is no replacing her for Gran.
I am Sarashina Ruka, and I will be joining you today.
Uh, y-yeah, she is a friend!
Kazuya-san's told me so much about you that I have been wanting to meet you.
We have a reservation for five...
He told me how you were the most amazing grandmother.
How did she find out about this?
She even knew where we were meeting up.
Do not tell me... it was back then?
Looks to me like you do have an idea.
Did she see the message then?
I do not think she will immediately spill the beans about us, but it is still risky.
I must say, you are a very pretty young lady.
How do you know them, Ruka-san?
We kept running into her on dates, and at some point she and I became friends, too.
We have practically grown up together, like sisters.
What are you talking about, Ruka-chan?
The rest of you, go in.
Er... Shall we head on in, then?
YOU-Uh, I need to visit the restroom.
You are two-timing her, are not you?!
Even if she will stand for it, I will not!
Either you cut ties with us,
or you break up with Ruka-dono!
Again, it is not what you think!
She is usually a nice girl, but she says the most random things at times.
And Chizuru's too nice to cut her off.
It is hard to believe Chizuru would let you two-time her,
and even harder to believe you would have two girls falling for you.
And we cannot turn away a friend of hers.
I will let Kazuo and Harumi know for you.
Do you seriously think you can keep this farce up forever?
You are overstepping your boundaries as a rental girlfriend.
You must not get involved in a client's personal life.
I can take over as girlfriend, and you can ride off into the sunset.
Do not you think that is the best option here?
And it is far more realistic than what you are doing!
Do you really think this is helping your grandmothers?
You are lying to them, you know!
I will admit that we have dragged this on too long, but it is a complicated situation!
You two are the ones overcomplicating it!
You just like Kazuya-kun, do not you?
You do not want me taking him away from you.
Maybe it is you who wants to stay on as his girlfriend.
I am serious about him, okay?
If you are not, please walk away like a proper rental girlfriend.
He is really bad with thrill rides,
And he was just so cute.
Kazuya-san, you have got sauce on your face.
Try not to make such a mess, okay?
I could watch him eat forever!
Kazuya-san, may I have a moment?
I cannot believe you deal with this every time you see her!
Why did you have to give me that backstory?!
Sorry, I made it up on the spot!
Your grandma and parents were smiling at me like some kind of saints!
I have to go fix this!
I am telling you, my family believes Mizuhara's my girlfriend!
If you keep pushing it, they will think I am two-timing!
You are lying to them about Chizuru-san, anyway.
There is no difference between zero-timing and two-timing!
I mean, are not I your girlfriend?
You said you would make me your girlfriend, if only as a trial at first.
But with your grandma, we have to act like Chizuru-san's your girlfriend,
and I am just a friend?
That is just too much for me!
That is the role I want.
I-It is almost time for the shrine visit, I think.
I heard you told your folks she is a pathological liar.
And she was okay with that?
Way to add fuel to the fire.
Well, we have lost Mom and Sarashina-san.
We should not have trusted her to keep her end of the deal.
We cannot pass the rental girlfriend thing off as a lie if she tells her.
Let us split up and look for them.
Tell her... I have to tell her!
It is not fair of you two to keep lying to her!
What she wants is a successor.
Then I am the better fit!
I am the one who can actually marry him!
She may be a rental, but Mizuhara is...
the best girlfriend anyone could ask for!
Anyway, I am glad I got to meet you today.
It is my first time meeting a friend of Chizuru-san's.
There is so much I want to ask you.
Is it any different from how she behaves around us?
Given how Kazuya's not much of a ladies' man at all,
as head of the Kinoshita family, I cannot help but put her on a pedestal.
I hope that is not proving to be a because of stress for her.
How many friends does she have?
What does she like, and what does she dislike?
What are her favorite foods, and what makes her laugh the most?
This is all I have been thinking about lately.
It is as though this bag of bones has fallen in love with a young girl.
It is not a granddaughter-in-law that she wants.
Forgive me for the barrage of questions.
You must think I am annoying.
Ruka-dono and I were just having a chat...
You are completely out of breath, Chizuru-san!
Shall we head to the shrine, then?
Let us have another chat sometime, Ruka-dono.
Do not just wander off like that.
Do not act like I am on my last legs!
Okay, let us go pray for a thriving business!
Other people's opinions are not Romance: Not a great time.
Listen, I am sorry about what I told my gran.
Also, uh... thank you for not spilling the beans.
And I hate Chizuru-san for meddling in your family's affairs as a rental girlfriend.
But I could not do it!
I knew it was not the right time to tell her!
Just no kissing or clinging to Chizuru-san!
I am not giving up, okay?
One day, your grandma will accept me as your real girlfriend.
This is going to be a battle of endurance.
Romance: You may find someone nice and close to you, but do not rush things.
You just like Kazuya-kun, do not you?
Already a chief at her young age
I need your help with homework!
Looks like we are getting new staff.
I am Sarashina Ruka, and I will be joining you as of today.
Conflicts: Up against women, you will lose.
Romance: Sudden storms are headed your way.
What did your fortune say, Chizuru-san?
You will fall for a college student who rented a girlfriend after being dumped?!
That would be the worst fortune possible.
I do not know why, but I hurt inside.
I will make that pain go away.
Just put on a blindfold again.
O-O-On the next episode of Rent-a-Girlfriend!
Ruka-chan, keep that thing on the down low, okay?
I will not mention the hotel thing even if it kills me!
